snippet.title: Codename: Gordon (PC) - Playthrough / Gameplay / Longplay
snippet.description:
Playthrough / Longplay / Gameplay of the hidden 2D Half-Life video game!
You can play it for free, while Steam is running, open your browser and insert steam://install/92 at the adress bar.

0:00 - Training Room
2:38 - Chapter 1: The Docks
7:12 - Chapter 2: The Harbor
17:26 - Chapter 3: The Beach
21:58 - Chapter 4: Buggy Race
24:02 - Chapter 5: The Prison
37:05 - Chapter 6: City 17

Release data:
Codename: Gordon (2004)
Genre: Action / Platformer
Platform: PC 
Developer: NuClear Vision
Publisher: Valve

#codenamegordon #halflife #freeman
